articles.title: Sunflowers' invisible colours are revealed - Daily Mail
articles.description: The same molecules that produce UV patterns in sunflowers also help the plant respond to stresses such as drought or extreme temperatures, experts from the University of British Columbia found.
articles.content:
They brighten our days with their sunny, vibrant and summery feel.
